string-array.name: diwali_english_message_list
string-array.item: Millions of lamps are illuminating to declare the victory of light,\nI wish you happy diwali with endless happiness and prosperity.\nHappy Diwali to You.
Wish you A happy diwali filled with fun and happiness.
On this auspicious day of Diwali Joy,\nhappiness and prosperity Come to your life,\nthrough the light from diwali lamps.
Celebrate the Festival of light Celebrate and enjoy Diwali Celebrate God’s Victory Happy Diwali to you.
I wish you a joyful year of prosperity Happy Diwali to you and your family.
When we say Happy Diwali We say happy for the Victory of god over evil.\nSay Happy Diwali to Dears and nears To express you happiness for the victory of God.

Diwali is the festival to celebrate the victory of God And that will be a great Diwali only if you spread the spirit of Diwali to those unfortunate Who are not able to celebrate Diwali When you share Diwali to them.\nGod will rejoice and bless you.
Here’s my greetings to spread the love and blessings of Goddess of Wealth and Beauty.\nMay you all have a splendid and magnificent celebration of Diwali!
Happy Diwali to you and your family.
May the light of sparkling Diyas bring your life an everlasting hope,\nfulfillment, happiness and prosperity.\nHave a happy and blessed Diwali!
I’m sending my warmest greetings to you this Deepavali.\nMay you and your family have a blessed and safe diwali celebration. Have fun!

string-array.name: diwali_gujarati_message_list
string-array.item: આપને મારા તરફથી દિવાળી ની ખુબ ખુબ શુભેચ્છા..
આપ સહુને દિવાળીની ખૂબ ખૂબ શુભેચ્છાઓ સહ, નવા વર્ષે ઉગતા સૂર્યનાં, પ્રકાશિત કિરણોથી ભરપુર, મંગલ જીવન હો, એવી પ્રભુ પાસે અભ્યર્થના …!..જયશ્રીકૃષ્ણ.
આપને મારા તરફથી દિવાળી ની ખુબ ખુબ શુભેચ્છા..
આપને મારા તરફથી દિવાળી ની ખુબ ખુબ શુભેચ્છા..
આપને મારા તરફથી દિવાળી ની ખુબ ખુબ શુભેચ્છા..

string-array.name: diwali_hindi_message_list
string-array.item: आप सभी को\nदीपावली की हार्दिक\nबधाई और शुभकामनाएं!

इस दिवाली में हमारी
कामना है कि आपका हर
सपना पूरा हो,
और आप सफलता के
उंचे मुकाम पर हांे
दीपावली की हार्दिक बधाई
और शुभकामनाएं!
दीवाली के इस मंगल अवसर पर आप सभी की मनोकामना पूरी हों, खुशियाँ आपके कदम चूमे, इसी कामना के साथ आप सभी को दिवाली की ढेरों बधाई.

जगमग थाली सजाओ,
मंगल दीपो को जलाओ,
अपने घरों और दिलों में
आशा की किरण जगाओ,
खुशियों और समृद्धि से 
भरा हो आपका जीवन,
इसी कामना के साथ 
शुभ दीपावली.

ये दिवाली आपके जीवन
में खुशियों की बरसात
लाए,
धन और शौहरत की
बौछार करे,
दिवाली की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं!

दीपक का प्रकाश हर
पल आपके जीवन में
नई रोशनी लाए,
बस यही शुभकामना
है आपके लिए इस
दीपावली में।
शुभ दीपावली!

दीपावली आए तो
रंगी रंगोली,
दीप जलाए, धूम धड़ाका,
छोड़ा पटाखा, जली फुलझडि़यां सबको भाए..
आप सबको दीपावली की शुभकामनाएं!
दीपावली में दीपों का दीदार हो,\nऔर खुशियों की बौछार हो।\nशुभ दीपावली!
इस दिवाली में यही कामना है कि सफलता आपके कदम चूमे और खुशी आपके आसपास हो। माता लक्ष्मी की कृपा आप पर बनी रहे।
आपको आशीर्वाद मिले गणेश से विद्या मिले सरस्वती से दौलत मिले लक्ष्मी से प्यार मिले सब से दिवाली के अवसर पर यही दुआ है दिल से हैप्पी दिवाली!
श्री राम जी आपके संसार में सुख की बरसात करें,\nऔर दुखों का नाश करें प्रेम की फुलझड़ी से आपका घर आंगन रौशन हो\nआपको दीपावली की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं!
Diwali Hindi Messages
Diwali Hindi Messages
Diwali Hindi Messages
Diwali Hindi Messages
Diwali Hindi Messages

string-array.name: new_year_english_message_list
string-array.item:
Nights are Dark,
but Days are Light,
Wish your Life will always be Bright.
So my Dear don’t get Fear Coz,
God Gift us a “BRAND NEW YEAR”
* HAPPY NEW YEAR *

I met love, health, peace & joy,
They needed a permanent place to stay.
I gave them your address
hope they arrived safely
“Happy New Year”

When you are lonely, I wish you Love!
 When you are down, I wish you Joy!
When you are troubled I wish you Peace!
When things seem empty, I wish you Hope!
With all above wishes, Have A Very Happy New Year.

Another year of success and happiness has passed.
 With every new year, comes greater challenges and obstacles in life.
I wish you courage, hope and faith to overcome all the hurdles you face.
May you have a great year and a wonderful time ahead, God bless you.
Happy New Year.
Wishing you a Happy New Year with hope that you will have many blessings in the year to come.
Lighten up your surroundings with your sweet smile and make way for happiness with your good deeds this New Year. Happy New Year.
Lets celebrate this blissful, cheerful, colorful New year with a smile.\nWish you Happy new year.
I wish you spend a great year ahead that starts with happiness and ends with that too.Happy New year.

My wishes for you are not limited to just the next year but to all the years that you experience in your lifetime and in your reincarnations!\nHave a fun-filled, smashing, rocking and happening New Years!
There are a lot of things in the world yet to be seen and experienced.\nLive your life, explore new horizons, go for new adventures this New Year and you will not regret it.\nHappy New Year.
As we bring this year to an end and the New Year begins.\nLet us pray that it will be a year with New Peace,\nNew Understanding and New Happiness.
May this new year bring peace and joy in your life and take you towards excellence.\nWishing you a very happy new year.
Lets welcome the year which is fresh and new,\nLets cherish each moment it beholds,\nLets celebrate this blissful new year.
May this new year all your dreams turn into reality and all your efforts into great achievements.\nHappy New Year.

string-array.name: new_year_gujarati_message_list
string-array.item: આપને નુતન વર્ષની ખુબ ખુબ શુભકામના,આપનું આવનાર વર્ષ સ્નેહ ,ઉલ્લાસ અને પ્રફૂલ્લીતા થી પરિપૂર્ણ રહે એવી મારી અભિલાષા , આમતો પ્રત્યેક વર્ષ આપણા પ્રયાસ પર નિર્ભર છે પણ શુભ કામનાઓ આપણામાં ઉત્સાહ ,મનોબળ , અને સકારાત્મક ઉર્જાનું સિંચન કરે છે આપ સર્વ કામો સકારાત્મક દ્રષ્ટિકોણ થી કરો અને પરિણામો પણ સકારાત્મક અને સંતોષકારક બને તેવી અમારી શુભકામના.
